title: ScoreboardStats插件不能显示金币问题，求帮助
author: res_js
txt_content:
11.png (16.92 KB, 下载次数: 8)

下载附件

2015-3-27 06:02 上传





有大神知道怎么破吗。172sp服务端。下面是配置文件，求指教。谢谢了
#Main configuration
disabled-worlds:
#This will not count vanished players in the online value
hide-vanished: true
Scoreboard:
  Title: '&5&l人物信息'
  #seconds
  # For instant updates you can or 1 and it will update every second
  Update-delay: 2
  Items:
    #The Title must have under 16 characters
    #Title: Type
    '&9在线人数&4': '%online%'
    '&6金币&4': '%money%'
    '&c生命&4': '%health%'
    '&1延迟&4': '%ping%'
    '&4生存时间&4': '%lifetime%'
    '&4杀人数&4': '%kills%'
#Let ScoreboardStats track stats (kills, deaths, mobkills, killstreak) You need no plugin for this
enable-pvpstats: true
#In minutes
PvPStats-SaveIntervall: 15
Temp-Scoreboard-enabled: false
Temp-Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lTop Kills'
  #%mob% | %kills% | %killstreak%
  Type: '%kills%'
  Color: '&9'
  #How many Players would be displayed
  Items: 5
  Intervall-show: 300
  Intervall-disappear: 300
pluginUpdate: true
